main.name: Nicolò Torreggiani
main.description: An enterprise architect engineer with a passion for Cloud, Blockchain and everything that concern new tech
main.bio: Technology Advisory Consultant currently employed at Accenture Consulting in the Techology Advisory practice as enterprise architect. I studied at Università degli Studi di Modena e Reggio Emilia, in Modena, where I got a MSc degree in Computer Engineering with a thesis titled "Distributed architecture for scalable management of unstructured time indexed data".
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.school: Università degli Studi di Modena e Reggio Emiliaa
education.thesis: Distributed architecture for scalable management of unstructured time-indexed data
education.subject: The aim of the thesis's project is the creation of a distrubted architecture that can manage data in a scalable way and index them with temporal informations. The thesis project required the execution of a project work lasting 6 months and 720 hours.

education.school: Università degli Studi di Modena e Reggio Emilia
education.thesis: Kelindo – Unsupervised Music Tagger and Organizer
education.subject: The aim of the thesis's project is the development of an application that can organize a disordered music library. The thesis project required the execution of a project work lasting 4 months.

work.title: Technology Advisory Consultant
work.description: Worked on the planning, design and realization of Enterprise Architecture in an Advisory project for a major player of the Banking market (Credit NPLs area).

work.title: Salesforce Consultant
work.description: Developed new feature for the CRM (Sales) of one of the biggest insurance company using Salesforce platform.

work.title: Digital Technology Developer Senior Analyst
work.description: Developed analytics applications with a proprietary framework called AIP Design Studio, an Analytics as a Service solution for major players in banking and energy market.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed REST/SOAP services for a mobile payment platform.

work.title: C# Developer
work.description: Designed and developed a software that analyze the Foreign Exchange Market (FOREX) and according to the strategies decides how to trade.
